      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Materia 2 - Kemiska föreningar</string>
            <string language="en">Matter 2 - chemical associations</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stoff 2 - chemische Verbindungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Matière 2 - associations chimiques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Matéria 2 - associações químicas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Materia 2 - associazioni chimiche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θέμα 2 - χημικές ενώσεις</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Materia 2 - asociaciones químicas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Om materian istället är uppbyggt av flera olika sorters atomer (grundämnen) så kallas den för en kemisk förening.Ingår i Modul 1 - Kemi A.</string>
            <string language="en">About materian instead is edified of several different types' atoms (elements) sow is called it pursue a chemical association.

Is included in module 1 - chemistry A.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">atom</string>
            <string language="sv">aggregationsform</string>
            <string language="sv">materia</string>
            <string language="sv">Kemi A</string>
            <string language="sv">kemi</string>
            <string language="sv">atomens byggnad</string>
            <string language="en">atom</string>
            <string language="en">aggregationsform</string>
            <string language="en">matter</string>
            <string language="en">Chemistry A</string>
            <string language="en">chemistry</string>
            <string language="en">the atom's building</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Über materian anstatt wird von den Atomen 
einiger unterschiedlicher Typen (Elemente) erbaut, das Abstichgraben 
es ausüben eine Chemikalie genannt wird association.Is, die in Modul 
1 - Chemie A eingeschlossen ist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Au sujet de materian à la place est édifié des
atomes de plusieurs différents types (éléments) que la truie 
s'appelle lui poursuivent un produit chimique association.Is inclus 
dans le module 1 - la chimie A.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sobre materian preferivelmente edified de átomos
de diversos tipos diferentes (elementos) que a porca lhe é chamada 
persegue um produto químico association.Is incluído no módulo 1 - o
chemistry A.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Circa materian preferibilmente edified degli 
atomi dei vari tipi (elementi) che la scrofa gli è chiamata persegue 
un prodotto chimico association.Is incluso in modulo 1 - chimica A.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Περίπου materian αντ' αυτού είναι του θηλυκού 
χοίρου ατόμων διάφορων διαφορετικών τύπων (στοιχεία) καλείται 
αυτό ακολουθεί μια χημική ένωση συμπεριλαμβάνεται στην ενότητα 1
- χημεία Α.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sobre materian en lugar de otro edified de los 
átomos de varios diversos tipos (elementos) que la puerca se llama le
persigue un producto químico association.Is incluido en el módulo 1 
- la química A.</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
